Movie & Dining: Up to ₹200 on Dining Bills With Swiggy Dineout
Rewards Rate: 10X CashPoints/₹150 on Flipkart, Amazon, Swiggy, BigBasket, and Reliance Smart SuperStore and 2 CashPoints/₹150 on Retail Purchases
Reward Redemption: CashPoints redeemable for cashback, purchasing products, flight/hotel bookings via SmartBuy and partner airlines' AirMiles

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: Renewal fee waived off on spending Rs. 50,000 or more in the previous year
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge waiver applicable on all fuel transactions
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the withdrawn amount (subject to a minimum charge of Rs. 500)

product_details: 2 CashPoints for every ₹50 you spend with the card (except fuel, wallet reloads, prepaid card reloads, and voucher purchases).
10X CashPoints on partner brands, including Amazon, Flipkart, Reliance Smart Store, BigBasket, and Swiggy.
Gift voucher worth ₹500 on spends of ₹50,000 in a calendar quarter (max benefit of ₹2,000 in a year).
Up to₹200 off on dining at over 2,000 premium restaurants in select cities.
Get a waiver on the annual fee for an annual expenditure of a minimum of ₹50,000.
